de.thkoeln.bibl.api.lms.slnp

Class SLNPConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.thkoeln.bibl.api.lms.slnp.SLNPConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Connectable

    public class SLNPConnection
extends java.lang.Object
implements Connectable
    Class implements a single SLNP connection. This connection controls the communication between client and SLNP server.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SLNPConnection(java.net.InetSocketAddress address, Credentials cred)
      Initialize a SLNPConnection with the supplied network address and uses the credential to authenticate at the server.
      SLNPConnection(SLNPConnection con)
      Initialize a SLNPConnection with the supplied SLNPConnection object.
      SLNPConnection(java.lang.String host, int port, Credentials cred)
      Initialize a SLNPConnection with the supplied host address/port and uses the credential to authenticate at the server.
      SLNPConnection(java.lang.String host, int port, java.lang.String user, java.lang.String pass, int branchId)
      Initialize a SLNPConnection with the supplied host address/port and uses the login information to authenticate at the server.

        Parameters:
        address - the network address to connect to
        cred - the credentials to use for authentication

      • SLNPConnection

      • SLNPConnection

        public SLNPConnection(java.lang.String host,
                      int port,
                      java.lang.String user,
                      java.lang.String pass,
                      int branchId)
        Initialize a SLNPConnection with the supplied host address/port and uses the login information to authenticate at the server.
        Parameters:
        host - the host address to connect to
        port - the port to connect to
        user - the username to use for the login process
        pass - the password to use for the login process
        branchId - the branch ID to use for the login process

      • SLNPConnection

        public SLNPConnection(SLNPConnection con)
        Initialize a SLNPConnection with the supplied SLNPConnection object. The login credentials and server address is used from the supplied SLNPConnection object.
        Parameters:
        con - the SLNPConnection to use the connection information from
